text: is a Japanese actress and singer. She is represented with Production Ogi. ==Awards== *2005: 31st Kazuo Kikuta Theatre Award (21C: Mademoiselle Mozart as Mozart/Madame de Sade as Rene) *2006: 61st National Arts Festival Theatre Department Newcomer Award (Marie Antoinette as Marguerite Arnaud) *2016: 7th Tokiko Iwatani Award ==Filmography== ===TV series=== {|class="wikitable" |- !
